name: Sarah Joseph
location: New York, New York, United States
education: Purchase College, SUNY - Bachelor of Fine Arts (BFA), Design Technology - Stage Management

experience.description: SFX makeup is my side passion and creativity outlet :). Skills include sculpting, mold making, application, blood gags, cuts/wound creation, painting, drag makeup, and beauty. I have also led a deep dive into SFX makeup at my full-time position.

experience.company: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
Universal Network Television, LLC - LAW & ORDER

experience.description: Worked as the Production Stage Manager with 2 Assistant Stage Managers during the COVID pandemic. Rehearsed half over Zoom and half in person. Prepared for in-person performances with limited audience and the ability to switch to remote if necessary.

experience.position: Production Stage Manager, Zoom Manager, and Editor
experience.description: Managed scheduling and information flow for a two-part online poetry event. Coordinated Zoom calls and recordings, assisted others with the platform, edited shows on iMovie, and streamed on YouTube.

experience.company: What To Send Up When It Goes Down
experience.description: Managed production during the onset of the COVID pandemic. Maintained calm and adaptability amidst constant changes. Transitioned the show to an online stream.
Assisted as a Production Assistant for the touring Mandy Patinkins Diaries during its Terrytown location. Held a talent-facing position.

Served as Stage Manager and first assistant to the Production Stage Manager. Led a team of 8 run crew to move six rolling 10ft walls. Organized all props for the show, which included fog, 8 LED movable poles, a removable ground cloth, and rose petals falling from the grid.
Assisted as a Production Assistant for the 50th Anniversary ATW Gala with Andrew Lloyd Webber. Helped organize and distribute meals to workers and ran various errands.

bio: Hello! I am a Production Coordinator based in New York City with a background in theater and a passion for events. I am always actively looking for new ways to continue growing. Personally, I manage through creativity, adaptability, and respect. Please feel free to contact me and form a personal connection.
